example_sentences.eng_trans: Recently I've come to enjoy my studies.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: このごろ勉強が面白い

example_sentences.eng_trans: My work at the office isn't interesting [any fun].
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 会社の仕事は面白くない
会は面白かったですか
ああ面白かった〔何かが終わって〕

example_sentences.eng_trans: The fish were biting like crazy.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 魚が面白いように釣れた

example_sentences.eng_trans: He's a very interesting fellow.／〔ちょっと変わっていて〕He's quite a character.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: あれはなかなか面白い男だ

example_sentences.eng_trans: The dialogue of the play is witty.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: せりふが面白い芝居だ
このまんがは面白くなかった

example_sentences.eng_trans: The patient isn't doing very well.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: どうも病状が面白くない

parts: 〔「面白くない」の形で，望ましくない〕
